MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML11 postcode area of Blackwood. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.11pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required on the underground cable network and require our specialist team to assist with repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:11 PM on Thursday, 18 March 2021.
